description:
Designed to maximize protection from the elements, and protection for the environment. Constructed using recycled materials and hardware, Shower’s Pass has done their best to give their Ecolyte Elite the smallest footprint it could. A 3-layer waterproof breathable shell, with fully taped seams, keeps you dry. Reflective details and bright colours help keep you seen on dreary days. And when the sun begins to shine, or at least the rain stops, this jacket packs into its rear pocket, making it easy to toss in a pannier or messenger bag.

  • Waterproof breathable recycled polyester shell has a polypropylene membrane that has a lower environmental impact than PTFE and PU membranes
  • DWR finish improves water repellency and helps your jacket shake off dirt and road spray
  • Helmet compatible hood is adjustable and removeable – via Velcro® tabs
  • Recycled zippers on the pockets and vents
  • Dual pit zips and large back vent improve airflow
  • 360° reflective details
  • Cinchable hem and elasticised cuff seal out the elements
  • Extended tail for extra coverage on the go
  • Showers Pass is Climate Neutral certified, meaning they fully offset their carbon emissions. Climate Neutral certified is a consumer label that's carried by brands who take responsibility for greenhouse gas emissions generated in production, operation and shipping of their goods and services
name: Showers Pass Ecolyte Elite Jacket - Men's
